original: Johansson, Karl Witus, redaktör, Värnamo, f. 13/4/95 i Svenarum, Jönköp. 1., av Viktor J. o. Mathilda Svens-dotter. G. 24 m. Ruth Karlsson. Barn: Sonia f. 25, Karl-Erik 34. — S. medl. av Sv. journ:fören. stud:resa på inbjud. av tyska rikspressfören. gen. T\-skl. 27, Medelhavskryssn. 35, ’Stud:-resa gen. Tyskl. 38, div. res. i Danm. o. Norge. Anst. v. Jönköp. 1. skogsv:-styr. 17-21, samtid, frilanis i pressen. Red. f. Värnamo-Bladet 22-30, start. Värnamo Nyheter 30, chefred., ansv. utg. o. verkst. dir. där. Led. av styr. f. Värnamo hemb :fören., tidv. sekr. o. v. ordf., 25-43, led. av styr. f. folk-högsk. sed. 27, styr:led. i Smål.-krets, av Sv. tidn :utg:fören. 40-46. Skr.: kultur- o. bygdebilder (22). Hobbies: resor, hemb :stud. Jönköp. 1. skogsv:-styr. ftjt. 32
translated: Johansson, Karl Witus, editor, Värnamo, born on April 13, 1895 in Svenarum, Jönköping County, the first child of Viktor J. and Mathilda Svensdotter. Married Ruth Karlsson in 1924 with whom he had two children: Sonia, born in 1925 and Karl-Erik, born in 1934. He is a member of the Swedish Journalists Association and has participated in several study trips, including one sponsored by the German Federal Press Association in 1927 and a Mediterranean cruise in 1935. He worked at the Jönköping County Forestry Board from 1917-1921 whilst also doing freelance work for the press. He was the editor of Värnamo-Bladet from 1922-1930, and started Värnamo Nyheter in 1930 where he was chief editor, responsible publisher, and managing director. He was a member of the board for the Värnamo Home Society and at times served as secretary and vice chairman from 1925-1943. He was also a member of the board for a folk high school from 1927 and a board member of the Swedish Newspaper Publishers Association from 1940-1946. He has written about local culture and community heritage. His hobbies include traveling and studying local forestry. He retired as a member of the Jönköping County Forestry Board in 1932.

structured.name: Karl Witus Johansson
structured.description: Karl Witus Johansson was a Swedish editor known for his work in Värnamo Nyheter newspaper. He was born on April 13, 1895, in Svenarum, Jönköping County, to Viktor J. and Mathilda Svensdotter. He married Ruth Karlsson in 1924 and had two children with her. Johansson was a member of the Swedish Journalists Association and participated in several study trips sponsored by different organizations. He worked at the Jönköping County Forestry Board from 1917-1921 while also doing freelance work for the press. He later became the editor of Värnamo-Bladet from 1922-1930 before starting Värnamo Nyheter, where he served as chief editor, responsible publisher, and managing director. Apart from that, he was a member of the board for the Värnamo Home Society and a board member of the Swedish Newspaper Publishers Association. He wrote about local culture and community heritage and had an interest in traveling and studying local forestry. He retired as a member of the Jönköping County Forestry Board in 1932.
